channel.title: Vagrant on Chiching's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Vagrant on Chiching's Notes

item.title: Start a vm by using vagrant
item.description: Install Virtual Box Install Vagrant Add vagrant box > vagrant box add centos/7 # this will download the box image to you local as a vm template, and you could find boxes on the public Vagrant box catalog Setup project mkdir vagrant cd vagrant vagrant init Update Vagrantfile ruby Vagrant.configure("2") do |config| config.vm.box = "centos/7" # box name is the one we added before config.vm.box_check_update = false # don't check update, so that the vm start speed faster.
